short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Edwiser Switch Theme is an extension for Moodle Developers & Admins that allows you to change theme without affecting live users.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Edwiser Switch Theme is a Chrome extension made for Moodle Developers and Admins. It lets you change your Moodle site's theme quickly and safely, so you can fix problems or try out new looks without affecting your live users. It's easy, fast, and hassle-free.

How to use?
1. Install the chrome extension on your browser.
2. Navigate to your Moodle site
3. Make sure the following settings are enabled:
Site Admin > Appearance > Theme > Theme settings > 'Allow theme changes in the URL.'
Site Admin > Developer > Debugging > Debugging Mode = 'Developer'
4. Click on Edwiser Switch Theme extension icon
5. To switch theme click on drop down and select the theme. The theme will be switched automatically.
6. To purge caches, click on purge caches.

How to add theme name to the list:
1. Go to your Moodle site
2. Click on the Edwiser Switch Theme extension icon
3. Click on Edit
4. Enter theme name 
5. Click on Add

Note: The extension will only work when you are on the Moodle site. Also, theme will be switched in the browser for you. The theme will not be switched for any other user on the site.
